profile:
Is your home in need of a little TLC?...Don’t have the time or experience to get that “To Do List” a bit shorter?... Don’t give it another thought, we’re here to help. Simcoe Property Services is committed to providing professional, friendly handyman and renovation services that will cure all of your home repair headaches. With over 25 years experience, you can count on us to get the job done right... at a fair price.

Services Include:
Kitchen and bath renos
Decks and fences
Custom built docks
Finished basements
Electrical and plumbing repairs
Drywall
Doors and windows
Masonry repairs
Laminate and hardwood floors
Tiling
Painting and staining
Landscaping and gardening
Tree and brush removal
and much more

We also provide ongoing residential and commercial property maintenance and cottage inspection services.
 

Proudly serving all of Simcoe County 

Discounts for seniors and Veterans
